activities: The Safe Passage International provides a web-based training system used to deliver aviation security and cargo security training courses and store training records related to the those courses. Users of the web-based training system are authorized only by their employer and are provided a unique User ID and Password. Using their unique credentials, users gain access to the training system including courses and related resources.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The people-related information collected through the Safe Passage web-based training system is used to establish individual user accounts. Each user account must contain (1) Last Name, (2) First Name, (3) User ID, (4) Password, and (5) Access Level. Each user account may also contain optional people-related information. The optional people-related information is (1) Address, (2) Phone Number, and
